wikipedia_page.main: Robert Owen (13 May 1820 – 6 April 1902) was a Welsh theologian and antiquarian.

response: Robert Owen (1771–1858) was a Welsh social philosopher and reformer; one of the founders of socialism and the cooperative movement.
* Robert Owen (Australian politician) (1799–1878), Politician and judge from New South Wales, Australia
* Robert Owen (theologian) (1820–1902), Welsh theologian and antiquarian
* Robert Owen (canoeist) (born c. 1955), British slalom canoer
* Robert Owen (darts player) (born 1984), Welsh dart player
*Robert Owen — An Introduction to the Study of Dogmatic Theology
*8 October — Robert Owen Hughes (Elfyn), journalist and poet (died 1919)
*17 November — Robert Owen, founder of the Co-operative Society, 87
